p.span: From the moment you drop them off with tear-filled eyes on the first day of kindergarten to the emotion-filled day they walk across the stage to receive their high school diploma – the Pea Ridge School District promises to put your child first. The safety, education, and post-graduation success of your child is our focus. We work daily to ensure your child’s learning environment and experience is truly uncommon.

The Pea Ridge School experience is uncommon for countless reasons. It starts with the genuine caring nature of our teachers, faculty, and administration. The personalized learning experience allows your child to receive the attention they deserve. Forward-thinking actions of our district’s decision-makers keep the district on the cutting edge of innovations in the education industry. Every choice is made with the best interest of our students at the forefront.
Pea Ridge School District is where a tight-knit community meets advanced education opportunities. It’s where every child has the opportunity to grow, learn, and be uncommon.

p.span: We want to ensure your child’s personalized learning experience is easy to understand.
HAC (Home Access Center) website is used by multiple buildings to allow parents to view their students’ schoolwork and other information.
Seesaw is a coursework and grading platform used only by the Primary (K-2) building.

Schoology is a learning management solution that allows parents and guardians to view coursework and their child’s activity. This allows the district to help fill the gap between home and school progress.

div.p: For questions, please email Dana Tabor at dtabor@pearidge.k12.com.
To request a one-time access code, call your child’s building to confirm your email address.

h2.strong: We invite you to join us on social media!

div.p: We have one district-wide Facebook page with groups for each of our buildings. The groups allow you to receive building-wide information, announcements, and details. The groups allow parents to subscribe to notifications and always stay up to date!
